title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Michigan State HC Mel Tucker on Saban Influence, Transfer Portal, Harbaugh Rivalry
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Michigan State HC Mel Tucker on Saban Influence, Transfer Portal, Harbaugh Rivalry
description:
First, (3:00), Fake Questions, Real Answers, including what Kyler Murray got wrong in his Twitter attack on Colin, if KD and Kyrie really need coaching, if Jerry West should be raging mad about his Winning Time portrayal, if Deebo Samuel should force his way out of San Francisco, and what Netflix’s massive losses exposes about streaming.

Then, Michigan State Head Coach Mel Tucker joins Colin to discuss what Nick Saban does better than any other coach (20:00), if the transfer portal has made coaching to much about recruiting (25:00), why it’s clear to him that football means less to Pac-12 schools (33:00), what he learned playing for Barry Alvarez at Wisconsin (36:00), the best high school football recruit he has ever seen in high school (46:00), if there is any reason to friendly with rival Jim Harbaugh (51:00), and what he immediately saw with Kenneth Walker III that sold him (54:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
